name: drug-data-collection
description: A local application for collecting and managing drug data

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=test npm run seed && NODE_ENV=test nodemon server.js
scripts.build:pkg:macos:arm: npm run package && cd dist && npx --yes pkg index.js --output start-macos --targets latest-macos-arm64 --config build-config.json && rm index.js && rm build-config.json && zip -r dist-macos.zip .
scripts.build:pkg:linux: npm run package && cd dist && npx pkg --yes index.js --output start-linux --targets latest-linux-x64 --config build-config.json && rm index.js && rm build-config.json && zip -r dist-linux.zip .
scripts.build:pkg:win: npm run package && cd dist && npx pkg --yes index.js --output start-win --targets latest-win-x64 --config build-config.json && rm index.js && rm build-config.json && zip -r dist-win.zip .
scripts.package: npm run build:ncc && cp -r public dist/ && cp .env.example dist/.env && npm run seed && cp abx-data.sqlite dist/abx-data.sqlite && cp build-config.json dist/
scripts.build:gyp: npx node-gyp configure && npx node-gyp build
